name: Disciple.Tools - Custom Group Health Plugin
author: prykon
upgrade_notice: Upgrade to get the latest features.

sections.description: Customize the way you track your groups' health. Select from popular church health templates or create your own.
sections.installation: (Required) You must have Disciple.Tools Theme installed before using this plugin. Once Disciple.Tools is installed, you can use the normal Plugin system to install the plugin.
sections.changelog: If a user has no custom group health icons created, the default Disciple.Tools template icons are selected.
